page.title: 09Policing the area
page.content: Our area is the responsibility of{ {Hackenthorpe Police Station,}built in 1950 and extended in 1967. There are 4 different departments,{C.I.D, {community policing, communications, {and patrolling.}There is 1 superintendent, 1 chief inspector, 6 inspectors, 20 sergeants, and 132 constables. In the station are 2 short term cells, a photo and fingerprint room, a control room, a breathalising room, a charge room and a C.I.D. dept. In the control room are 2 computers, 1 linked to the D.V.L.C. in Swansea and the otherto the National Police Computer. Hackenthorpe has 8 patrol cars, 1 response car, 2 Land Rovers, 2 Transits and 4 plain C.I.D. cars.
